Key Match Events: Jordyn Adams' infield single in the 13th inning scored Eric Wagaman, and the Los Angeles Angels dealt the Chicago White Sox their 117th loss, rallying for a 4-3 victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the 117th loss for the Chicago White Sox
The Los Angeles Angels dealt the Chicago White Sox their 117th loss
The game went into 13 innings before a decisive home run was not needed as Adams scored Wagaman on an infield single
